welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Evesham, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy our beautiful town, filled with unique attractions and friendly locals."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and has a variety of amenities including restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and offers duty-free shopping and a business lounge for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Wings Field Airport provides a luxurious and convenient experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
